alert.note: Alert for Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 3:56AM PST until February 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING CANCELLED... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.
